Package view

Class MenuView

java.lang.Object
view.abstracts.ARenderView
view.MenuView
All Implemented Interfaces:
view.interfaces.ViewHelperInterface, view.interfaces.ViewInterface
public class MenuView extends view.abstracts.ARenderView
The MenuView is a class in the View layer to display the menu of a branch. This class extends the abstract base view classARenderView

    Method
    Description
    void
    displayDrinks()
    Displays the menu by Drink Category
    void

    Display the menu by Main Category, which is classified as any Menu Item that does not belong in Sides or Drinks

    Displays the menu by Main Category with Title Border

    Displays the full menu without categorization

      public void renderApp(int selection)
      Description copied from interface: view.interfaces.ViewInterface
      Renders the application based on the provided selection.
      Parameters:
      selection - The selection made by the user for navigation. This method is typically used for app navigation.

    • renderChoice

      public void renderChoice()
      Description copied from interface: view.interfaces.ViewInterface
      Renders the choices available to the user. This method is used for printing static strings describing choices.
